description: Visual open-source tool for creating, designing, and editing SQLite database files

shims.name: sqlitebrowser
shims.target: {{TAURIO_ROOT}}\bin\sqlitebrowser\DB Browser for SQLite\DB Browser for SQLite.exe

start.command: C:Taurio insqlitebrowserDB Browser for SQLiteDB Browser for SQLite.exe
start.label: Open DB Browser for SQLite
